input_text.Prompt:
Given a item title and item features, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item title:
Giro Women's Skyla Cycling Helmet (Pearl White/Red Floral)

Item features:
Snap-fit visor
In-Mold polycarbonate shell with EPS liner
Acu Dial fit system
20 vents
input_text.Response A: Get ready to turn heads on your next cycling ride with the Giro Women's Skyla Cycling Helmet. With its sleek and stylish design, this helmet will make you feel confident and comfortable on the road. The in-mold polycarbonate shell with EPS liner provides superior protection, while the snap-fit visor keeps the sun out of your eyes. The Acu Dial fit system ensures a secure and comfortable fit, and the 20 vents keep your head cool and dry. Whether you're a seasoned cyclist or just starting out, the Giro Women's Skyla Cycling Helmet is a great choice.
input_text.Response B:
Here's a fun product description for you:

This cool pink helmet has a snap-fit visor to protect your eyes from the sun. It's made with a strong outer shell and soft lining that fits your head perfectly. The helmet has 20 vents to keep you cool and comfortable while you ride your bike. It's a great choice for kids who love riding their bikes and want to look cool while they do it!

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.

label_annotations.feedback: Response B does alter information. It says the helmet is pink- the description was pearl white/red floral. Also, it says it is a great choice for kids- but the description makes no reference to children, and is for women.
